Affix.Name: Martial Artist
Affix.Desc: After using Elemental Skill, increases Normal Attack and Charged Attack DMG by 25% for 8s.

EQUIP_RING.Name: Martial Artist's Wine Cup
EQUIP_RING.Desc: A rather exquisite wine cup used in pre-combat rituals.

EQUIP_NECKLACE.Name: Martial Artist's Feather Accessory
EQUIP_NECKLACE.Desc: A common bird feather. Experts use it to practice strength control, while rookies use it to make fans.

EQUIP_DRESS.Name: Martial Artist's Bandana
EQUIP_DRESS.Desc: The first lesson as an apprentice: Vigor, Strength, Will. These words are written on the bandana so you'll never forget them.

EQUIP_BRACER.Name: Martial Artist's Red Flower
EQUIP_BRACER.Desc: This particular kind of red flower was the only thing that could alleviate the Martial Artist's pain.

EQUIP_SHOES.Name: Martial Artist's Water Hourglass
EQUIP_SHOES.Desc: A tool to keep track of time in endurance training. It is more accurate and reliable than a regular hourglass.
